name: PowerCenter:Set "DTM Buffer size" at "Auto" or at a consistent value on Sessions
description:
List all Sessions with "DTM memory" not between X bytes and Y bytes.
The X and Y threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Sessions containing a value of the property "Shared Memory" not between X bytes and Y bytes.
It provides the following information: 
Session full name
The Associated value is the value in bytes
rationale:
Session shared memory is used to transfer readen data, transformed data and writen data. 
This DTM memory is at "Auto" since PowerCenter 8.1.1 release, for new session only. This DTM memory was, before 8.1.1 release, at 12 MB, and could be set manually also at an innapropriate level, which could have a negative performance impact.
remediation: Set the value to "Auto" or calculate, according to documentation, the specific memory requirements, particularly for partitionned session.
total: Total number of Workflows, Worklets and Folders

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
